name: part_011
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: IRyS and Ouro Kronii finishing their performance.
A transition cinematic showcasing the city and 'Promise' logo.
IRyS and Hakos Baelz perform the song 'X.U.'.

subtitles.original: Ha...
subtitles.english: Ha...

subtitles.original:
X.U.
Lyrics: Benjamin, mpi Music: 澤野弘之
subtitles.english:
X.U.
Lyrics: Benjamin, mpi Music: Hiroyuki Sawano

subtitles.original: I don't want nobody to get killed
subtitles.english: I don't want nobody to get killed

subtitles.original: I'll come and get you I am always ready to fight
subtitles.english: I'll come and get you I am always ready to fight

subtitles.original: So don't take all of the blame we will split it away
subtitles.english: So don't take all of the blame we will split it away

subtitles.original: Don't take all of the weight you always do
subtitles.english: Don't take all of the weight you always do

subtitles.original: There will always be something you cannot control
subtitles.english: There will always be something you cannot control

subtitles.original: We will overcome your salvation has begun
subtitles.english: We will overcome your salvation has begun

subtitles.original: No signs, no lights, such a mess all over
subtitles.english: No signs, no lights, such a mess all over

subtitles.original: Don't kill your hopes
subtitles.english: Don't kill your hopes

subtitles.original: You make me realize who I need
subtitles.english: You make me realize who I need

subtitles.original: I'll be there, hold on, they'll change somehow
subtitles.english: I'll be there, hold on, they'll change somehow

subtitles.original: So where are you now?
subtitles.english: So where are you now?

subtitles.original: I'll reach you, my dawn, before you can be turned
subtitles.english: I'll reach you, my dawn, before you can be turned

subtitles.original: Illusions are born
subtitles.english: Illusions are born

subtitles.original: The fallen angels you run with don't know
subtitles.english: The fallen angels you run with don't know

subtitles.original: it is our pain that makes us all human after all
subtitles.english: it is our pain that makes us all human after all

subtitles.original: Who will save me? If you don't show
subtitles.english: Who will save me? If you don't show

subtitles.original: our fragile precious world
subtitles.english: our fragile precious world

subtitles.original: Must protect it, respond to the call
subtitles.english: Must protect it, respond to the call

subtitles.original: Are they really deep inside your head?
subtitles.english: Are they really deep inside your head?

subtitles.original: Do they control you like a little marionette?
subtitles.english: Do they control you like a little marionette?

subtitles.original: I'll cut the strings off you dead, come in with me
subtitles.english: I'll cut the strings off you dead, come in with me

subtitles.original: let me free the wings of your soul and make it fly
subtitles.english: let me free the wings of your soul and make it fly

subtitles.original: We've been waiting here just to make you whole again
subtitles.english: We've been waiting here just to make you whole again

subtitles.english: No more hating see I have always been your friend

subtitles.original: If you want to fight with me
subtitles.english: If you want to fight with me

subtitles.english: Then go ahead and fight with me

subtitles.original: Cause all I want to do is help you, man
subtitles.english: Cause all I want to do is help you, man

subtitles.english: You will be the death of me

subtitles.english: The power of our army has been cut with us all
